Ubuntu Guru Forms¶

This module contains forms used in the Ubuntu Guru application.

class Ubuntu_Guru.forms.CustomUserCreationForm(*args, **kwargs)[source]¶

Bases: UserCreationForm

Extends the default UserCreationForm to include username, email, and password fields explicitly. Used for registering new users from the frontend.
